places_with_reviews.name: The LaLiT Ashok Bengaluru
address: Kumarakrupa Rd, opposite Golf Club, Kumara Park East, Seshadripuram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

reviews.text: The location is amazing. It is a huge property. The rooms looked a little old, but were comfortable for the stay. Overall property will give you a relaxing vibe with birds chirping in their pool side surrounded by all green landscapes. You are in the middle of the city and yet it gives you a feel of some outpost of the farm....

Lalit ashok is a good hotel to stay, however banquet Staffs must learn mannerism to talk to customers very very Bad experience when I conducted the meeting, payment was suppose to done by Third party which was agreed upon, how ever when delay happened, banquet Manager asked the  company people must not leave without making payment, which was suppose to be done by Third party.

Very very bad experience, still not able to understand how they stop company people stepping out from the room, because payments agreed by third party, no role of company persons.

Bad experience please advise your banquet people to behave wisely with customers. .

Any body planning to conduct any meeting please mindful, you may also have bitter experience

Only good thing about this hotel is the location close to  IISc where I was visiting . So much loud noise in the evening that I had to fight to get a quiet room. Food was contaminated as we had repeated stomach upsets. I don't know who are all giving this  good reviews about this hotel. Maybe they are purchasing reviews.

The recent 10th-grade graduation party held at Lalit hotel on March 20, 2024, was meant to be a cherished milestone for our children, but unfortunately, it turned into a distressing and disappointing experience. The decision to accommodate over 400 kids without proper vetting procedures was not only imprudent but also irresponsible. Locking them in Sutra without air conditioning and access to basic amenities like water, which are essential rights, was deeply troubling and in violation of government regulations. Moreover, labeling the event as a high tea and failing to provide adequate food for minor attendees is unacceptable. These issues represent just the tip of the iceberg. The absence of security measures and insufficient lighting in the outdoor area further compounded the risks, especially considering it was a coed gathering. We commend the parents for their swift intervention in averting any potential incidents. Despite repeated pleas, it's disheartening that the hotel failed to address our concerns adequately.

I'm stay,

The room I stayed in was spacious, beautifully decorated, and equipped with all the modern amenities one could ask for. The comfortable bed provided a restful night's sleep, and the panoramic views of the city from my window were simply breathtaking.

places_with_reviews.name: The Leela Palace Bengaluru - Garden City's Only Modern Palace Hotel
address: 23, HAL Old Airport Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Kodihalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008, India

reviews.text: We celebrated our daughter's birthday and relaxed atmosphere. The lunch buffet offered an amazing variety of delicious dishes. Dining at the citrus restaurant was a mouthwatering experience. The food was full of choice and flavours. Desserts were superb. And got complementary birthday cake also. The staff provided attentive service especially MR.MANOJ and MS. SULTANA. Certainly i would visit again and would highly recommend.

The Leela Palace Bangalore is a luxurious 5-star hotel located in Bengaluru.

The Leela Palace Bangalore is renowned for its opulent architecture and regal design. Inspired by the architectural style of the Royal Palaces of Mysore, the hotel features grand interiors, intricate detailing, and elegant furnishings, creating a palatial ambiance for guests.

The hotel offers luxurious accommodation options, including rooms, suites, and Royal Club rooms, designed to provide the utmost comfort and luxury for guests. Each room is exquisitely appointed with modern amenities, plush furnishings, and panoramic views of the city or the hotel's lush gardens.

The Leela Palace Bangalore boasts a diverse array of dining options, including fine dining restaurants, specialty cuisine venues, and chic lounges. Guests can indulge in culinary delights from around the world, with menus curated by award-winning chefs using the finest ingredients. The hotel also offers bespoke dining experiences and private dining options for special occasions.

The hotel features extensive meeting and event facilities, including ballrooms, boardrooms, and outdoor venues, making it an ideal destination for business meetings, conferences, weddings, and social events. The hotel's dedicated event planning team ensures seamless execution and personalized service for every event.

Guests can relax and rejuvenate at the hotel's recreational and wellness facilities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, spa, and beauty salon. The spa offers a range of therapeutic treatments, massages, and wellness therapies to promote relaxation and well-being.

The Leela Palace Bangalore is renowned for its legendary hospitality and impeccable service. The hotel's staff is committed to providing personalized service and ensuring that every guest's needs are met with utmost care and attention to detail.

My family and I had a delightful buffet brunch at The Leela Palace, Bangalore.
Stunning architecture fineness .
The ambiance was awesome.
One of the finest experience really a great place. Great hospitality.
To cherish you will have to experience it.
Must visit.

We had evening dinner here. The test was good. Service was excellent! I often visit this place. And it's one of my fevorites place for lunch/dinner, casual or for business meetings.
It's a very well maintained, peaceful place..

The Leela Palace Bangalore is a luxurious oasis amidst the bustling cityscape. From the moment you step into its opulent lobby, you're enveloped in elegance and grandeur. The regal architecture, adorned with intricate details, exudes timeless charm. The spacious rooms and suites offer unparalleled comfort and style, ensuring a memorable stay. The impeccable service and attention to detail elevate the experience, catering to every need with grace and professionalism. Whether indulging in gourmet dining, rejuvenating at the spa, or simply lounging by the pool, every moment at The Leela Palace Bangalore is a celebration of luxury and sophistication.

places_with_reviews.name: ITC Gardenia, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bengaluru
address: 1, Residency Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

reviews.text: Very nice hotel that is a bit dated but amazing rooms. Their breakfast offering is really wonderful and the bar has such a nice vibe. The only negative is, they don't have a luggage room so don't be surprised if you see your checked bag out in the open at the lobby. I understand they have cameras and a lot of people around but it is just bad security practice since our bags not only have valuables but also important documents like passports. Find a small room out of sight and locked is my advice to management even if it is an ugly closet.

Had the pleasure to interact with the amazing chef Devanshi. She is an absolutely incredible chef and more so helpful person. During my visit I requested to meet the chef because I am passionate about the industry and wanted to learn more from her first hand experiences. She sat down and helped me understand a lot.
The conversation was literally eye opening for me.  So glad to have met her !

Incredible hospitality. By far one of the best hotels in Bangalore. Loved the breakfast spread. Despite being an relatively older property, the hotel looks and feels great. Staff are the highlight, always eager to help and truly make you feel at home. True Indian hospitality 🙏

Great location and great staff. Most friendly and helpful receptionist and staff. I stayed here for 3 nights for my business meeting in Bangalore. Everything about the hotel was exceptional. It was clean, stylish, roomy with excellent housekeeping service and most importantly good wifi. Room itself was well equipped and comfortable. I was very pleased with my stay. I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.

Just returned from one week stay in this hotel. Really enjoyed being there. Beautiful place with lovely greens around. I like the hotel philosophy of taking care of plants and animals living in its environment. Eco friendly. Staff and service very responsive.

places_with_reviews.name: JW Marriott Hotel Bengaluru
address: 24/1, Vittal Mallya Rd, KG Halli, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

reviews.text: This hotel made my trip a pretty cool experience. You know when you are staying in a good hotel automatically makes your stay 100x better . From the hotel to our room being really clean to the whole staff being amazing everyone was so nice and friendly. Nessa, Blanca & Mitch. From the rest of the Valet parking being so nice but didn't get the rest of their names. Truly nice hotel with excellent staff. When I come to San Francisco I will forsure stay at The Marker no hesitation. Great hospitality by housekeeping team and front desk. This was my best memorable stay of my life. We had the most amazing time staying and having wine IN THE FIREPLACE!!! Such a cute room and the staff was incredible from Bianca who checked us to Melinda who took our photos in the lobby! The valet was very professional and the restaurant made for the perfect breakfast. We will be back!!

We were here for a conference so i will be able to speak about only their conference room stuff. Look and feel is your typical Marriott, I don't think anything separates this from another Marriott maybe style is slightly different.
We were mainly in the ball room. It's a good room, sound acoustics were great, room was big too with double height ceiling. The light was customised for our use so i can't comment on stock lighting.
I was disappointed with the food (benefit of a doubt is that it might have been a package and not the regular fare, but does not come up to what I was expecting of a Marriott). Rest rooms were good, clean and smells good too.
Overall, a good experience.

Well, I stayed for two days at this hotel. The facilities they provided were appropriate as per the demands of the customer. I would suggest the people to stay at this hotel to have a wonderful experience. The rooms are spacious, food provided was delicious as I ordered vegetarian. Overall experience was contended.

Staff are unhygienic. Hotel needs to make sure the staff adequately shower before a shift. I shouldn't have to pinch my nose when someone enters my room.

The rooms are also not well insulated from outside sound. Had a balcony room overlooking the park, which has a nice enough view. You can't really use the balcony because the city has filthy air, so it's not pleasant sitting outside in the pollution. But also the noise of traffic, honking horns, etc. is nonstop. Unless you're a very deep sleeper and can sleep in noisy environments, don't stay in one of these rooms. I was in 912.

They moved me to another room (1426?) which didn't have a balcony. The room was not as nice but it was not as loud, so I could get some sleep. Not ideal though. The other side of the hotel faces a shopping mall with bars, so on weekends will be very loud until after 1am.

The curtains they have are inadequate considering the noise. They should have, especially in balcony rooms, very heavy blackout soundproofing curtains.

Breakfast is good and much better, cleaner, and better managed than ITC Gardenia. The executive lounge for platinum members is also much better than ITC Gardenia. Gym is good. Pool looks nice, but didn't use it. Again, it's not nice being outside with such bad air quality.

TV is not an updated or smart TV.

Front desk staff are nice and dealt with issues as best as they could.

Very nice room and staff is very good in giving service.
Looking at price i recommend this hotel.
You will feel to visit next time.
Thank you.

places_with_reviews.name: Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru
address: 2275, Tumkur Rd, Yeshwanthpur Industrial Area, Phase 1, Yeswanthpur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560022, India

reviews.text: People visit to 5 star for an experience. The arrangements done by the staff for my kid’s birthday was good. The restaurant team were pushy for the main course and were not giving any privacy to enjoy the meal.

Overall a great experience during my stay. Great ambience and comfortable rooms led to a pleasant stay. Service from front desk and the restaurant was exceptional, with a special mention to Aniket who went above and beyond.

The one area below expectation was room service with unreasonably long wait times.
We had been here for Family function hence no rating on Rooms, Ambience was quite okay but food taste was just not upto mark & Stewards were missing supplier behavior need to enhance

Just the Taj standard that does not need a certificate.. too good.
The food spread and quality is unmatched and so is the service....
Rooms are spacious and well equipped with all facilities.
Good swimming pool and Jim for fitness fans
The only downside is the main entrance opening on the wrong side of a very very busy road crossing..

Arguably the best business hotel in north Bangalore. Quite busy , with business conventions and private events alike through the year. Convenient to reach by metro (train) , than by road. They provide all amenities viz conceirge, travel , stay , food, live music etc. staff is quite helpful and soft spoken.

places_with_reviews.name: The Ritz-Carlton, Bangalore
address: 99, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

reviews.text:
I recently attended a tech summit at this hotel and had a fantastic experience! The vibe was energetic and perfect for a day of learning and networking. The food was exceptional, with a wide range of options to suit various tastes. The quality of the cuisine was top-notch, and I enjoyed every bite.

Although I didn't stay overnight, I was impressed with the hotel's amenities and atmosphere. The staff were friendly and efficient, ensuring a seamless experience for attendees.

Overall, I'd highly recommend this hotel for events and conferences. The combination of great food, comfortable surroundings, and excellent service makes it an ideal venue for productive and enjoyable gatherings. Well done, team!

When you visit a good place automatically good vibes comes out.
Happy to be here, the rooms are awesome every single space or corners of the room seems to be proper maintain. Finish of the rooms and whole building and it’s decoration is just wow.
The staff is so busy if you ask something on breakfast he forget to serve that was a fault I faced but maybe my bad but no doubt it’s too good, I enjoyed….

The place is really fantastic. It's clean, smells really nice and the service is top notch. I requested an airport transport and i thought they wouldn't provide because there was no confirmation but surprisingly they provided. It feels homey and luxurious at the same time. The bed feels amazing. One of the best sleep I ever had. The pool is small but it's fine. The staffs are very warm and welcoming. I really liked the club lounge. The food was great. I just want more food variety in the market. The hotel is located in the heart of the city which is good if you want to explore the city life. The area is very same. The security is tight which is okay because it made us feel safe.

Lovely place and a wonderful staff. They always greet their guests no matter what time of the day. Breakfast was sumptuous. Staffs were courteous. Rooms amenities are very good and the sheets are clean. Truly a best Ritz Carlton Experience.

We visited The Market yesterday/ 14th February, obviously for a romantic dinner, but it was overly crowded. Management literally put extra tables and chairs anywhere and everywhere, obviously to get more business. It was hot,  exhausting and suffocating. Romantic dinner ? We felt like we have come to an overly crowded marriage ceremony. There was 3/4 inches gap between every table, other’s conversation was over lapping ours. Whenever we were going to take some food we always had to adjust, squeeze our way  through between two table. Like seriously? And we paid 7k for for this. We were told there will a dedicated person who will attend us, although we didn't expected that, but that doesn't mean there will be no one to at least refill the empty water bottles, to give fork, knives even after asking multiple times. Don't know  about other day, but definitely will not  recommend to go there on special days. Better go to any fancy luxury restaurant. You will get some peace of mind with your loved ones and of course a cool and calm environment.

places_with_reviews.name: The Chancery Pavilion
address: 135, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

reviews.text: The Chancery Pavilion in Bangalore is a remarkable 4-star hotel that offers a warm and friendly atmosphere from the moment you step into its grand lobby. Its elegant and modern decor exudes luxury and sophistication, setting the tone for a memorable stay. The spacious and well-appointed rooms, along with their stunning city views, provide a perfect sanctuary for relaxation. The impeccable service from the staff enhances the experience, ensuring all needs are met with professionalism and attentiveness. The dining options are diverse and delightful, ranging from fine Indian cuisine to refreshing cocktails at the rooftop bar. The hotel's amenities, including a well-equipped fitness center and a serene rooftop pool, add to the overall allure. Its central location near major attractions and business districts makes exploration convenient and enjoyable. In summary, The Chancery Pavilion offers an exceptional experience, combining luxurious accommodations, excellent service, delightful dining, and a convenient location, making it a top choice for both business and leisure travelers alike.

Enjoyed a delightful stay for a friend's wedding at this venue. The rooms were generously sized and cozy. The breakfast buffet impressed with its authentic flavors and diverse dining choices. The special wedding menu showcased a delectable array of cuisines, each dish bursting with authentic and delicious flavors. The petite pool offered a refreshing and open atmosphere, though a spa within the hotel would have been a welcomed addition. Nonetheless, my overall experience was comfortable and enjoyable.

I had the pleasure of staying in this five star hotel and the first impression was their warm welcome at the entrance. Enjoyed a delightful stay at this venue. The rooms were spacious and cozy. The breakfast buffet impressed with its authentic flavors and diverse dining choices. Nonetheless, my overall experience was comfortable and enjoyable.

I had the privilege of staying at this hotel lately, and my impression of the stay is nothing short of amazing. The personnel was very attentive and friendly, going above and above to make sure I was comfortable. The service was excellent. The well-kept apartments provided the ideal balance of contemporary conveniences and homely atmosphere. The food options were excellent; every meal was a gourmet treat! I heartily suggest this hotel to anyone looking for an excellent place to stay with first-rate amenities and service. An absolutely remarkable encounter

The hotel and rooms are decent. But I think it can do better for the money. The beds were comfortable, the food spread for breakfast was amazing! The help staff were kind and helpful. For me hospitality matters more than anything, and we got it a lot from the help staff. For things the hotel could improve on, it says it’s a 5 star but the bathrooms were not that clean and the pool was freezing cold. I was looking forward most to the pool and it was unbearable to get in. I was hoping some form of heating with be there. I noticed no one else was getting into the pool as well. I had a bad experience with one of the customer service receptionist who asked me to leave earlier than what was agreed upon when I checked in. I had asked for an extended checkout time as I had checked in late with my elderly parents. So, I asked for it to be extended and said that I would pay for the same. She paused the line and went to “talk to her colleagues” and came back to tell me that I had to leave. You’re asking a guest to just leave without offering any alternatives and asking them to leave early before the agreed upon time. I went to the reception to clear it out and thankfully there was someone who confirmed my actual checkout time and gave me options for extended checkout with payment. Grateful for that man who helped me out. All in all, please teach your new receptionists to offer better hospitality and come up with clear solutions.

places_with_reviews.name: Shangri-La Bengaluru
address: No. 56, 6B, Palace Rd, Abshot Layout, Vasanth Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

reviews.text:
The hotel is facilities are very high end and nice. However, you can to start to see small blemishes of wear and tear if you look really closely. But overall, still really good. The service is exceptional. There is always someone to help you. Some go above and beyond to serve you. The hotel is located further away from busy city centers or other restaurants. It’s technically walkable within 20-30 minutes but you would want to take a short Uber or Auto anyways given how crazy traffic is. Overall, very great hotel experience!

Overall, the experience is excellent.

Had a chance to visit Shangri-La hotel for a business event. The staff welcomed with genuine warmth. The dishes were good and had a diverse array of dishes for the afternoon buffet. The service was exceptional and the attention to detail from the staff was great. Looking forward to my next visit and would highly recommend.

Most of the staff were so lovely, especially in the bars and restaurants, however, had a couple of poor experiences with staff, once in the cafe when someone, I suspect was a manager from the suit he was wearing, took a mobile phone call when I was talking to him, very poor. Then I was sitting in the foyer in a relaxed position, genuinely not with my feet on furniture, or laying down or anything and a member of staff came up to me and told me to sit up straight? I was like what… We’re members of the Shangri-La club and stay with them for the great service and international understanding of their guests, but this was pretty different from the service we get at their other locations across Asia. Kind of marred the experience for us.

Very happy with a four night stay in Feb 24. Room was exceptional and breakfast was very much an Indian feast. Great quality all round. Very clean and no issues with hygiene. Found the staff friendly. The 17th floor lounge is a great work space and surprisingly quiet during the day to get work done

The hotel's facilities were equally impressive. The spa was an oasis of tranquility, with a wide range of treatments and services that left me feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. The fitness center was well-equipped and spacious, with state-of-the-art equipment that made my workouts enjoyable and effective.

The hotel's restaurants and bars were exceptional, with a diverse range of cuisines and flavors that catered to every palate. The breakfast buffet was extensive, with a wide variety of fresh fruits, pastries, and cooked-to-order dishes that were simply delicious.

Too many items that were absolutely lip smacking. Desserts were superb. One definitely needs to have a huge appetite to try all the dishes here. One of the best buffets I've ever been to in Bengaluru.

places_with_reviews.name: Taj MG Road, Bengaluru
address: 41/3, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Yellappa Garden, Yellappa Chetty Layout, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

reviews.text: My breakfast experience at Taj Hotel was simply outstanding! The spread was impressive, featuring a diverse selection of delicious dishes. The made-to-order omelette station was a highlight, and the ambiance was elegant. The staff provided impeccable service. Highly recommended for a memorable breakfast experience!

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this hotel for business purpose. The luxurious ambiance, prompt service, and attention to detail created a truly memorable experience. From the elegant rooms to the fine dining options, every aspect of my stay was exceptional. The staff's pro-activness and genuine hospitality added a personal touch, making it a truly wonderful stay for me. Highly recommend for those seeking a top-notch hospitality experience. It gonna definitely give you a good feel of Indian culture.😊
Well located, the food is decent and the rooms aren't as big as expected. You'd still enjoy your stay in a clean hotel. The pool isn't as great as expected from the brand.

Excellent breakfast , authentic South Indian cuisine served with love and attention to detail.
Continental items also available, plenty of fruits and juices . Hot items - dosas served to your table , loved the filter coffee. And much more .
Staff is courteous and will go out of the way to help you.
Would love to stay again

Was there at lunch with family, seamless reservation experience over a phone call. Reserved a table at the Trinity Square restaurant. Wonderful spread, good choice of seafood too. Patient waiters and staff. All in all a great experience.

places_with_reviews.name: Conrad Bengaluru
address: 25/3, Kensington Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008, India

reviews.text:
Truly five-star persona. The quality of food, courteous service, delectable decor and ambience all make up for the price paid. Their buffets are extremely nice with care taken on quality of every dish served. They also have live counters of pizza and pasta which were pretty good too. Desserts need a special mention as they were very delicately made and tasted amazing.
Overall a very nice experience.

Had a lovely time at the Conrad! Beautiful hotel with great service and very clean modern rooms. Really cool pool area. Only slight issue was the chicken wings being undercooked twice (despite being sent back) in Tiamo.

Will definitely return again!

What a way to destress your body at the Conrad spa with masseuse Celine!! I stayed at the hotel for two nights and on my first day I booked a 90 min Swedish Massage followed by a 30 min scrub.
After the scrub I had to take a shower and sat in the steam room for about 15 min. Then I got the Vitality Wrap, this was amazing! Especially after the scrub! Your body gets a hydrating mask and gets wrapped in with clothes and a warm blanket. It felt so relaxing!

Celine made a very good and professional impression, she is really great in what she does. The pressure was perfect and she really focused on the painful areas! I highly recommend her.

Because it was so good, I couldn’t stop myself from getting an Indian head massage of 30 min on the next day!:)

Thank you so much Celine! Can’t wait to book another treatment with you. You made my stay here excellent!

Fantastic and modern hotel with superb quality of service and attention to detail. Have stayed here two times already and definitely staying again when in Bangalore. Beautiful, large and clean rooms, top views of the city, great quality restaurants and facilities, and everyone just makes you feel special! On a check-out was even given a cute toy to bring back home to the child!

Excellent stay - the staff is incredibly welcoming, helpful, and courteous.  I recommend this hotel. Highlights:
1) Safe - upon entrance onto the premises, all cars are checked, before going inside the hotel all bags are scanned.
2) Welcoming and kind staff - from the security folks at the entrance, to the host at the door, to check in staff at the front desk, to hosts and hostesses in the lobby, to the buffet area staff across host/hostesses, waiters, cleaners, servers), to the spa staff, and to the restaurants staff including the chef. Everyone contributed to an overall positive stay.
3) Clean rooms - very satisfied with the neat, nicely organized, and overall tidy room, with bottled water provided.
4) Food - breakfast buffet, room service meals, and on-premise restaurants offer wide variety of food, and everything I tried was super tasty. At the restaurant - chef came out to check in on us, very nice touch!
5) Spa - services are great and therapist I had truly knows her craft.
6) Concierge services - superb, from basic inquiries like pointing to ATM, to helping me with nearby places to visit, to arranging someone to go to a post to help me mail a postcard back to US - I'm thankful!
7) Extras - my stay overlapped with Holi, and I felt amazingly inclusive as the hotel staff set up Holi celebration on the pool patio, with everyone welcoming me, sharing and introducing me to the culture, foods to try, and overall being true hosts!

Overall great stay, and I recommend travelers to stay here.
